title: 1.16倒计时
author: yzcabc
txt_content: 明天就出1.16正式版了，大家有什么想说的吗

replies.author: Basin.
replies.txt_content: 冲！ 就一个字

replies.txt_content: 等optifine出了我就更1.16

replies.txt_content:

中国版玩家表示泪目

replies.txt_content:

replies.txt_content:
